Description: Sherd of wall of North Ionian open vessel, perhaps bowl; cream slip; glaze mottled on inside; inside glazed with added red band lined in white; exterior: lower parts of feline to right, with blobs as fill; below, fine line and broad band with added white and red lines; top of lower frieze with trace of decoration.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.933)
